mapper.insert: insert into sys_notice ( title, content, publisher, addtime, uptime, sequence, status ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{publisher}, #{addtime}, #{uptime}, #{sequence}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update sys_notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, publisher = #{publisher}, uptime = #{uptime}, sequence = #{sequence}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
